notes.extraction: Icons extracted from Figma Icon Library (Node ID: 854-2692)
notes.usage: Use icon names or aliases to reference icons. All icons use currentColor for stroke/fill to inherit text color.
notes.viewBox: All icons use viewBox="0 0 24 24" for consistent sizing
notes.strokeWidth: Default stroke-width is 2 for outline icons
notes.aliases: Icons can be referenced by their name or any of their aliases
